name: Patter (JMAA GAMES)
description:
Patter is an interactive (non)fiction game where you're an anonymous Patter user about to have his town nuked out of existence, and you have to scream into the app before you inevitably die, by "patting" diverse "pats" that can gain some followers.

Get as many followers as you can. You have 30 seconds before your town gets annihilated.

The game aims to show the futility of the feel-good dopamine rush of social media, where they do little to nothing for actual social or political change. Since this game is meant to spread awareness about it, 50% of the donated proceeds on this itch.io game will go towards the PCRF (Palestine Children's Relief Fund) at http://pcrf.net

You can also play the game free of charge.
